message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm very interested in the product. However, $1,200,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to offer $950,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me and your asking price.

I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit steep for you, but $950,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me and its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1,100,000 is closer, it's still a bit higher than I'm aiming for.  I'm willing to offer $1,000,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value to both of us.  I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price.

I understand that we're close, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,050,000, which is a compromise that I think is fair considering the product's value to me and its value to you. I'm confident that this price will be acceptable to both of us.
